resources.string: UNATTENDED HUMAN OCCUPANT DETECTION SYSTEM FOR CARS WITH MOBILE ALERT NOTIFICATION
View past alerts of detected movements inside the car when the engine is off.
Set a timer (5 mins to 1 hr) to temporarily pause monitoring.
Access a list of emergency contacts for quick assistance.
Control the alarm of the device when a human is detected inside the car.
Show the current battery level of the device.
View the car owner\'s personal information.
